pr_title: Avoid Redundantly Loading Monitoring Templates on CS Applier Thread (#62913)

timeline.message:
Avoid Redundantly Loading Monitoring Templates on CS Applier Thread (#62913)

This refactors the loading of monitoring templates slightly so that they aren't loaded over and
over again (from disk) on CS updates. This isn't an important optimization in production for obvious
reasons since it only affects the install stage, but this turned out to cause some slow CS applies
in tests.

Relates #62853

timeline.bodyText: Should you use the static templateName import here and throughout? It looks like you might be mix 'n matching.
